channel.title: Weapon Requirements! Help me Please I know its nooby...:/
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/Project420banner.jpg[/img] Ok so the pvp armor and stuff everyone can wear at 1 def and of course I don't want that I have a Delta based server named Project 420. It is a 317 server and how do I make it so like you cant wear it unless you 78 Defence is there a TUT if not can someone make it.
Here is a example of wat I want but for my PVP armor [IMG]http://i924.photobucket.com/albums/ad84/Migeant/wep.jpg[/img]
Thank you for Helping

item.title: Weapon Requirements! Help me Please I know its nooby...:/
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

For an example, let’s assume that you are trying to make this work for a whip.
Whip ID = 4151
playerLevel[0] = attack

if(wearID == 4151 && playerLevel[0] < 70){
sM("You are not a high enough level to use this item.");
sM("You need to have an attack level of 70.");
return false;
}

playerLevel[0] = Attack
playerLevel[1] = Defence
playerLevel[2] = Strength
playerLevel[3] = Hitpoints
playerLevel[4] = Range
playerLevel[5] = Prayer
playerLevel[6] = Magic

If you want to do it with items 9800-9811. Replace the WearId number with that.
Depending if it is a weapon, armor it has different requirements. Since I used whip, whip only has requirements for attack. playerLevel[0] is = attack. So I say playerLevel[0] < 70. Because you need a requirement of at least 70 to wear whip.

(Keep in mind, I’m not the best coder.)

Read full topic
